message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking  $20,000 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product. Could you meet me at $18,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your response. I'm still not able to go above $12,000 for this product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
